Metadata.Title: Sico University
Metadata.Description: Sico University: This is a public welfare educational organization established by Sico Winter Minecraft Olympics. Our primary purpose is to disseminate knowledge, the main courses include university-level cultural courses and Minecraft redstone command-related courses.

Home.Heading: Welcome to Sico University
Home.Paragraph1: At Sico University, we are a public welfare educational organization established by Sico Winter Minecraft Olympics. Our primary mission is to spread knowledge 🦸, with courses covering cultural subjects on university level, plus some practical classes linked to the Minecraft Olympics. We embrace a free atmosphere; anyone can be lecturer or learner here, with no barrier to attending courses.
Home.Caption: During the New Year event, the Sico University lab building was overjoyed

About.Title: About Us
About.Description: Welcome to Sico University, a public welfare educational organization established by Sico Winter Minecraft Olympics. Our mission is to spread knowledge.
About.Heading: Where knowledge and passion intersect ‚Äî our origin is to <gradient>enlighten minds and empower the future</gradient>
About.Intro:
Welcome to Sico University, a public welfare educational organization established by Sico Winter Minecraft Olympics. Since our founding, we have strived to keep knowledge flowing and nurture future growth 🦄, committed to building platforms for young learners.



Here, we believe education is the spark that changes the worldüî•. We do more than deliver knowledge ‚Äî we shape practical capabilities. We have cultural courses on university levels, as well as Minecraft-Olympics‚Äìaligned courses covering event management, competition planning, and more.



🐣 ‚ùÑÔ∏èThis is why Sico University was born.



Current situation of campuses and independent colleges:



Sico Campus: School of Mathematical Sciences, School of Science, School of Computer Science, Institute of Chemistry, Institute of Astronomy and Theoretical Physics

Zhazhong Campus: School of Literature and History, School of Arts, Institute of Literature, History, and Art

School of Life Sciences: Institute of Botany, Institute of Zoology, Institute of Microbiology, Institute of Marine Biodiversity and Evolution

School of Sports: Olympic Research Center

Founder.Title: Key Figures
Founder.Description:
Su Xiyao: Research fellow and associate professor at CAS, PhD from USTC (the pinnacle of your Olympics credentials), primarily teaches advanced mathematics (though other subjects are fine), an ultimate guru.



Hantianji Ying: Chemistry major at USTC (still a level you must look up to), mainly teaching chemistry at all levels.



Hydrogen peroxide: Founder of the Sico organization, a chemistry competitor. You can study alongside him or share your knowledge if you‚Äôre strong enough.



Trident 233: A Minecraft redstone master, you can humbly seek guidance.

Careers.Title: Join us
Careers.Description: Are you tired of a dull traditional education model? Join Sico University and build a more vibrant future with us using your thirst for knowledge!
Careers.Heading: Join us and unleash your <gradient>educational superpowers</gradient> to spark new thinking
Careers.Intro: Remember the excitement and eagerness of discovering new knowledge for the first time? Here, our mission is to provide more practice and inspiration to ignite your passion for learning. If you believe in constantly breaking through and exploring new ideas, welcome to Sico University. Let‚Äôs create incredible educational experiences together ‚Äî act now and let your enthusiasm take flight! ‚ú®
Careers.Grow: At Sico University, we believe everyone has <gradient>limitless potential</gradient> to advance and break through. We promise an environment full of opportunities and support where everyone learns from each other and grows together.
Careers.Fun: <green>Balancing work, study, and life</green> is an important concept we uphold. We strive to make every academic activity or group gathering enjoyable and relaxed, so you can spark more creative ideas.
Careers.Async: At Sico University, we champion efficient collaboration and open communication. We practice flexible study discussions and hold regular showcases, exploring new territories together.

Details.Subtitle: About us
Details.Preface: Like a flock of high-tech birds üê¶, fully remote yet always connected, most of us teach or learn from home, but we do have a great space in üèôÔ∏è Shenzhen for offline collaboration. No matter where we are, we‚Äôre all ‚ù§Ô∏è passionate creators. We love challenges and pour our energy into every course and project. Whether you‚Äôre a ‚Äúcoding ninja ü•∑‚Äù from Tokyo, a ‚Äútea connoisseur üçµ‚Äù from Hangzhou, or a ‚Äúdim sum master ü•ü‚Äù from Hong Kong, if you share our enthusiasm for public education, we look forward to having you on board!

Benefits.Title: Course Inspirations
Content: Winter Olympics Live Broadcasting: Practical OBS+GT Streaming Workshop - Student Projects Integrated into Real Curling Match Coverage
Redstone Digital Workshop: From Basic Circuits to CPU Design - Teaching Computer Principles through Minecraft
Blockchain Creative Programming: Developing Digital Olympic Badge System - Managing Event Volunteer Points via Smart Contracts
Ice Boat Command Lab: Bedrock Edition Mod Driving + Track Building - Graduate Ready to Build Virtual Racing Venues
Interdisciplinary Architecture: Western Villa Modeling with Mechanics Calculations - Student-Designed Ice Sculpture Exhibition Hall Now in Use
Dynamic Language Classroom: Fifty Sounds Chart Memory Method Evolved into Multi-language Sports Commentary Training System
Plant Data Visualization: Transforming Botanical Taxonomy Papers into AR Olympic Venue Guide System
Complete Event Development: From Ice Boat Track Programming to Opening Ceremony AE Animation - Full Olympic Project Pipeline

OurStacks.Title: Wild Ideas
Content: Virtual-Physical Synthesis Classroom: Teaching Digital Logic with Redstone Circuits, Explaining Historical Records through AE Animation
Event Sandbox System: Complete Winter Olympics Tech Stack from Ice Boat Programming to Live Broadcasting
Interdisciplinary Fusion: Blockchain Crypto Art Exhibition + Botanical Data Visualization Featured in Graduation Show
Legacy Activation: Dynamic Graphics Created by Alumni using GT Now Playing in Winter Olympics Memorial Hall
Command-Based Teaching: Controlling Opening Ceremony Light Shows via Command Line - Code as a New Artistic Medium
Architectural Formula: Western Villa Modeling Assignments Applied to Community Senior Center Renovation
Language Laboratory: Fifty Sounds Chart Method Evolving into Multi-language Sports Broadcasting Training
Eco Workbench: Plant Classification Data Integration for Ice Venue Climate Control System Optimization
Mixed-Age Workshop: Art Freshmen and CS Seniors Collaborating on AR Guide App Development
Museum of Failures: From Redstone Circuit Crashes to Japanese Listening Mishaps - All Become Teaching Cases
Dynamic Assessment Network: Using Blockchain to Track Knowledge Point Mastery Paths
Minimalist Package: Educational Revolution - Professional Event Broadcasting with just OBS and Mobile Phone

Portfolios.Title: Works Gallery
Portfolios.Heading: Works Gallery: let‚Äôs witness our <gradient>uniquely remarkable</gradient> projects together
Portfolios.Description: Feel free to explore our showcase and see the outstanding works we‚Äôve been part of.
Portfolios.Intro: Welcome to Sico University's <gradient>educational experiment space</gradient>, where knowledge transforms into action with each leap forward. We believe real learning isn‚Äôt about filling minds but about lighting a <green>torch of problem-solving</green>. Here, cultural courses lay solid academic foundations, while practical projects allow knowledge to flourish in realistic scenarios ‚Äî bridging abstract concepts and real-world challenges‚ùÑÔ∏è.

Contact.Title: Contact us
Contact.Heading: Contact us: <gradient>look forward to sparking ideas with you</gradient>
